TopicTitle: Anyone Still playing KSP 1.0.5? If so, Are there any Dark Multiplayer Servers Up?

Articles.Content: Till today there are so many KSP versions. I'm here just thinking does anyone still plays KSP 1.0.5? If someone do plays that KSP version somewhere in the world except me, are there any Dark Multiplayer servers up to date for KSP 1.0.5? I thought it would be nice if I could play Dark Multiplayer for the first time. It would be nice if somebody could make a server and do something about it. I don't really have much to say so... yeah thats all i got to say.
I occasionally fire up a 1.0.5 save here and there, It runs better than 1.2.2 (only when I look at the Ground) But I have not messed around with the muliplayer stuff, I will look into it though.
I was going to ask, is there something special about 1.0.5 that you're preferring to use it?

I haven't bothered to update past 1.0.5.

Server list can be found here.

For me, 1.0.5 is the last version I can get to still render the surface of Kerbin on every frame.

I hope to be moving up this year when I get a new PC with an actual video card, but I'll be keeping it around as a stable fallback.
